title: Small Statuette of the Child Horus Seated
description:
One small bronze (w/out seat) figure of a nude young god. He wears the skull cap and uraeus with sidelock. Broad collar is present. His feet rest on a flat plinth. 
Condition: Solid cast. Brownish/copper color patina. Chunk taken out of the chin. Cuprite in some places. Surface somewhat pitted and features obscured.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
